view.description: URI to view the opening - see HR-XML

apply.description: URI of the page where a candidate applies - see HR-XML

availableInternally.description: Position is currently open to internals (implies status is active, but callers should check that relevant closeDates are in the future)

availableExternally.description: Position is currently open to externals (implies status is active, but callers should check that relevant closeDates are in the future)

publishDate.description: the date on which the job was published (became available to candidates)

internalPublishDate.description: the date on which the job was published to internal candidates. If not set, use publishDate.

externalPublishDate.description: the date on which the job was published to external candidates. If not set, use publishDate.

closeDate.description: the date on which applications are scheduled to close

internalCloseDate.description: the date on which applications from internal candidates are scheduled to close. If not set, closeDate is used.

externalCloseDate.description: the date on which applications from external candidates are scheduled to close. If not set, closeDate is used.

code.description: A code, often used in advertisements and when referring to the job opening with candidates. Codes are expected to be unique within currently active job openings. Not in HR/XML

title.description: A short phrase describing the position as it would be listed on a business card or in a company directory

shortSummary.description: A short (up to 75 characters) and enticing call to action for candidates for this job

company.description: as per Salesforce, more explicit than org

country.description: a 2 letter country code for the job as per ISO 3166-1 alpha-2
